title: LiveStreamer
about: Web application for broadcasting live audio and chatting. Conceptually, it is similar to Mixlr but on a smaller scale.

title: Musicbox
about: Browser-based music library explorer for a home server. Musicbox is a  database-centric app. It parses standard ID3v2 tags of your audio files and provides a simple interface to search, sort, and filter your music collection.

title: Automation Scripts
about: Bash scripts to automate repetitive tasks

title: Simple Static Site Generator
about: Vanilla Node.js static site generator developed for personal website

title: Biscuit Components
about: SASS UI components/code snippets library for developing websites based on BEM methodology and a mobile-first approach
